programme.title: rage Best New Music Videos of 2025
programme.desc: rage rounds up some of the best new music videos and hidden gems of 2025.

programme.title: rage Best of the Charts 2025
programme.desc: rage rounds up the hottest chart-toppers of the 2025 ARIA Singles Charts.

programme.title: Rage
programme.desc: Keep the party vibe going every Saturday morning with wall-to-wall music videos, from classic hits and long-forgotten tracks from the rage vault, to the latest new releases and special features.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon
programme.desc: Melissa Mackay presents the latest from ABC News on the weekend bringing you todays top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, analysis and updated news, sport, weather and information.

programme.title: Royal Carols: Together At Christmas
programme.desc: The Princess of Wales returns to host her very special annual Christmas carol service featuring songs, musical performances and readings.

programme.title: Vera
programme.desc: DCI Vera Stanhope is on track to uncover an intriguing yet puzzling case when the body of a sickly young girl is discovered at the side of an isolated railway crossing.

programme.title: rage Best Of The Guests 2025
programme.desc: rage revisits the best of 2025s guest programmers, from Mallrat to Evan Dando, The Offspring, Ninajirachi, Paris Texas, Ruel, DIIV and more.

programme.title: Rage
programme.desc: Keep the party vibe going with wall-to-wall music videos, from new releases to classics and the long-forgotten.

programme.title: Annabel Crabbs Civic Duty
programme.desc: In the early days, Parliament House hosted an all-male conclave of politicians and newspapermen, sharing a cramped environment and a complex code of conventions and mutual dependency. But the age of disruption has arrived.

programme.title: Compass
programme.desc: DOBBY is a Filipino-Murrawarri rapper determined to use his voice to send a powerful message around climate, racism and injustice. We follow him to his childhood home and on to Brewarrina for a moving performance.

programme.title: Gardening Australia
programme.desc: Gardening Australia celebrates the holiday season as Costa Georgiadis visits Jimmy and Jane Barnes at home, Clarence Slockee transforms a boggy spot into a rain garden, and Jerry Coleby-Williams explores fragrant frangipani.

programme.title: Extraordinary Escapes
programme.desc: In this magical Christmas Special, QI host and national treasure Sandi Toksvig travels to snowy Norway in search of more Extraordinary Escapes, this time Scandinavian style. (Final)

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia
programme.desc: In Yarraville, Victoria, a passive house builder starts a crusade to build the healthiest home in Australia on the site of an old pigeon club house! (Final)

programme.title: Portrait Artist Of The Year
programme.desc: In the Grand Final, three outstanding artists each have four hours to paint a portrait of adored comedy icon Denise Scott, each drawing on their unique approach to artmaking.

programme.title: Good Game Spawn Point
programme.sub-title: Super Mario Rpg And Spawn Squad!
programme.desc: This week on GGSP: we review the classic role playing adventure remade for Switch with Super Mario RPG, plus Maddie joins up with the Spawn Squad, and we recommend some games that are like Splatoon, but different!

programme.title: The Inbestigators
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Extremely Empty Freezer
programme.desc: Ava plans a birthday party to cheer up a lovesick Mr Barker, but things go wrong when his birthday cake goes missing during the celebrations.

programme.title: Malory Towers
programme.desc: The girls rally behind Susan when her mother announces she will be leaving and that this will be Susans last day at Malory Towers! Clarissa and Ruth have a plan, but soon find themselves in hot water with Miss Grayling.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.sub-title: Where Theres A Will, Theres A Wraith
programme.desc: Scooby and the gang have to spend a night in a haunted mansion.

programme.title: The Powerpuff Girls
programme.desc: When Mojo and Barbarus announce their wedding, the girls are convinced that theyre up to no good.

programme.title: Merry Madagascar
programme.desc: When Santa and his reindeer crash onto the island of Madagascar, its up to Alex, Marty, Gloria, Melman and those wacky penguins to save Christmas.

programme.title: Officially Amazing
programme.desc: Jet powered flips, spiders on the body and a barrel-riding dog attempt to break world records.

programme.title: Good Game Spawn Point
programme.desc: This week on GGSP: We go on an adventure with the Heeler family in our review of Bluey: The Videogame! Plus, we speedrun our way through a review of the treacherous climbing of Jusant, and Mevin joins the Spawn Squad!

programme.title: rage FIFTY 2025 Preview Special
programme.desc: rage teases the best music videos of 2025. Did your favourite make the cut?

programme.title: Malory Towers
programme.desc: Felicity is on track to win the school cross country race, but when she fails to cross the finish line after a clash with Alicia, Darrell fears the worst and goes in search of her - with dramatic consequences...

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: c:3bkxmas c:3bkxmassp c:3xmas c:christmascrackers

programme.title: ABC Kids Programs Resume At 4am
programme.desc: ABC Kids programs resume at 4.00am

programme.title: Paddington
programme.desc: A young Peruvian bear travels to London in search of a home. Finding himself lost and alone at Paddington Station, he meets the kindly Brown family, who offer him a temporary haven.

programme.title: Penn And Teller: Fool Us
programme.desc: Featured magicians include Cash, Ales Hrdlicka, Henry and Klauss, and Jonah Babins and Ben Train.

programme.title: Car S.O.S
programme.desc: Tim and Fuzz come to the rescue of an ex-naval divers Triumph Stag. With the cars owner gradually losing the use of his legs, the lads will transform the Stag from a manual into an automatic with adapted pedals.

programme.title: The Next Step
programme.desc: Richelle and Shad hold auditions to find a soloist to be the lead in Step Inside.

programme.title: Moominvalley
programme.desc: When a charismatic winter sports champion arrives in the valley, Moomintroll struggles to win back Snorkmaidens affections.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania: The Series
programme.desc: When Mavis innocently fibs that today is her birthday, it sets off a chain of events that leads to a very confused Gary Death starting over and - poof - making Mavis a baby again.

programme.title: Badjelly
programme.desc: Tim and Rose meet Binklebonk, a tree goblin living in fear of The Beast of The Backwoods.

programme.title: Heartbreak High
programme.desc: Kurt is worried about tension within the group and offers a solution.

programme.title: Phil Spencer: Secret Agent
programme.desc: Donald Fergusons semi has been on the market for two long years. Phils determined to help but when Donny realises this means removing the masses of mahogany that make his house seem small and dark, hes unconvinced.

programme.title: Melbourne Comedy Festival Gala
programme.desc: Luke McGregor hosts comedys night of nights - The Melbourne International Comedy Festival Gala for Oxfam, featuring Tommy Little, Geraldine Hickey, Lloyd Langford, Cal Wilson, Nikki Britton, Sammy J, Alex Ward and more.

programme.title: Absolutely Fabulous
programme.desc: Eddy and Patsy take the baby to her first modelling job - a photo shoot at the zoo. Jean-Paul Gaultier is on location, much to their delight, but will they manage to return baby Jane home safely?

programme.title: Rage
programme.desc: Need a break? What about a breakbeat? Put your feet up as rage plays the best of hardcore, acid, big beat and progressive breaks.

programme.title: If Youre Listening
programme.sub-title: Was Jeffrey Epstein a Mossad agent?
programme.desc: The Jeffrey Epstein rabbit hole has opened into a cavernous abyss and it seems no one is safe. Conspiracy theorists are following a particularly spicy lead: that Epstein was actually Israeli intelligence. So is it true?

programme.title: Heartbreak High
programme.sub-title: Never Had A Friend Like Me
programme.desc: Kurt is worried about tension within the group and offers a solution.

programme.title: Moominvalley
programme.desc: As the valley evacuates under the threat of volcanic eruption, Moomintroll helps Snufkin on a perilous quest to return a lost fire spirit to her home.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania: The Series
programme.desc: Aunt Lydias invisibility poncho arrives and it is glorious. But after Mavis and the gang accidentally destroy it, they must keep up the charade and pretend Lydia is invisible.

programme.title: Do Not Watch This Show
programme.desc: A mysterious bucket is following Wizz everywhere. Its going to pour all over his head if you keep watching and hes desperate for that not to happen.

programme.title: Mythbusters
programme.sub-title: You Cant Teach An Old Dog New Tricks
programme.desc: Is it possible to teach an Old Dog New Tricks? In attempt to find an answer Adam and Jamie go head to head with a pair of untrained middle-aged Malamute Huskies.

programme.title: Phil Spencer: Secret Agent
programme.desc: In Kent, Karen Spellar has been struggling to find a buyer for her three-bed for almost a year. Phils determined to help it sell, but first hell have to deal with some problematic pets and a gothic colour scheme.

programme.title: Star Wars: Young Jedi Adventures
programme.desc: Kais bad day worsens when a simple mission goes awry.

programme.title: Ben And Hollys Little Kingdom
programme.desc: On a tour of the Elf Factory, the Elf and Fairy children learn about recycling and see how rubbish is re-used and made into toys. When the factory runs out of raw material, they set out to find some more.

programme.title: Twirlywoos
programme.desc: An octopus jumps on and off Peekaboo, before jumping on and off the Twirlywoos.

programme.title: Daniel Tigers Neighbourhood
programme.desc: Chrissie gets upset when O plays horse differently than her. X shows them that there are so many ways to pretend.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Miss Rabbits train has broken down with a carriage full of passengers who need to get to work. Grandpa Pig lends Miss Rabbit his little train Gertrude.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Paddington
programme.desc: Mr Gruber gives Paddington a Chinese finger trap, Paddington gets attached to Mr Curry and they are stuck together whilst auditioning for the Windsor Gardens play.

programme.title: Ariel
programme.desc: Ariel tracks down a mythological sea creature. Ariel and friends get a substitute teacher in music class.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Jacks the new dog at school and the newest recruit in Rustys army. Jack struggles with following instructions and always forgets his hat,Ã‚ but Rusty will make a soldier of him yet.

programme.title: Knee High Spies
programme.desc: When Silver Paw tries to fly to the moon in a bottle rocket, Jeremy and Squash take to the skies to save her.

programme.title: Fizzy And Suds
programme.desc: Fizzy and Suds meet the penguins! See them snuggle, waddle, nap, and slide. From gentoo to king penguins, its a chilly, splashy, fishy adventure full of fun.

programme.title: Super Monsters And The Wish Star
programme.desc: The Super Monsters celebrate Christmas with a magical Wish Star that grants heartfelt wishes and sparks chaos, teaching lessons about teamwork, friendship, and the joy of the holiday spirit.

programme.title: Maddie + Triggs
programme.desc: Maddie is annoyed when the wind takes her paper bird away, but soon both she and Triggs are blown away on a magical adventure that celebrates all the things the wind can do.

programme.title: Andy And The Band
programme.desc: The band turn detective to go in search of a missing flying disc. Can they crack the case?

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Doctor Hamster comes to school to talk about butterflies. The children paint caterpillars, make butterfly wings and even dance the life cycle of a butterfly.

programme.title: Big Lizard
programme.desc: Its been one year since Cosima crash-landed on Proxima, but no one else has remembered this anniversary! Can a perfect picnic jolt their memories?

programme.title: Tish Tash
programme.desc: Tish and Bobby are having trouble finishing their vegetables during dinner time so, Rosa and Pola have taken away the cake until they are finished.

programme.title: Builder Brothers Dream Factory
programme.desc: Drew, Jonathan and the rest of their Crew turn the Dream Factory into an amusement park to celebrate Carloss birthday.

programme.title: Octonauts
programme.sub-title: The Octonauts And The Giant Whirlpool
programme.desc: The Octonauts race against time to rescue Tweaks pal, a Leatherback Sea Turtle whos caught in a fast-moving ocean current thats sucking it into a whirlpool.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: Duggee is putting up a picture of himself with his old friends that he grew up with, who are just like family to him. This inspires the Squirrels to take a photo of their own!

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: When James, Mandy and Annie use the horse and cart to deliver their cherry pop to The Taste of Pontypandy competition, chaos ensues!

programme.title: Millie Magnificent
programme.desc: When Miles misses out on seeing a beautiful rainbow, Millie tries to recreate one for her little brother, in her very own home.

programme.title: Gardening Australia Junior
programme.desc: Tammy and Molly learn about different miniclimates in the garden and even create their own - a terrarium!

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and George are watching Detective Potato on television. When Daddy loses his car in the car park, Detective Potato appears and saves the day!

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.sub-title: The Tale Of The Lost Journal
programme.desc: When Benjamin accidentally loses Peters dads journal it falls into the clutches of Mr Tod...

programme.title: Octonauts: Above And Beyond
programme.desc: A rainy season storm in the West African Savanna interests Paani, until a mudslide sends Tunip and the Terra-Gup 1 tumbling into a ditch. Luckily, a mysterious nocturnal creature, a pangolin, helps with the rescue.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: In the park Bluey meets a new playmate Winnie, but when Bluey wants to invite her and her dad home for breakfast, she learns that adults take a little bit longer to make friends.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: Duggee is going to make the squirrels juice from lots of lovely fresh fruit in the garden. Whilst they are picking all the fruit the Squirrels meet a little bug, full of woes about being too small.

programme.title: Piripenguins
programme.desc: Pancake saves Flutter who vows to repay him, but his behaviour drives Pan to distraction.

programme.title: Star Wars: Young Jedi Adventures
programme.desc: Jedi track down artifacts stolen from the town fair.

programme.title: Ben And Hollys Little Kingdom
programme.desc: The Elves and Nanny Plum are busy clearing up all the leaves. Suddenly the squirrels arrive with a mission to store acorns in the Great Elf Tree, but the Wise Old Elf has a cunning idea to rid the tree of the acorns.

programme.title: Twirlywoos
programme.desc: The Twirlywoos visit a school hall. The teacher comes in and picks up a hoop and spins it, then another and another. She leaves them lying flat on the floor. The Twirlywoos set all the hoops spinning at the same time.

programme.title: Daniel Tigers Neighbourhood
programme.desc: Daniel runs into Grandperes house with dirty shoes and makes a mess. Daniel says sorry and helps Grandpere clean up.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: There is a pet competition at playgroup, and everyone has brought in their pets. Dr Hamster is the judge but finds it hard to choose the best pet...

programme.title: The Adventures Of Paddington
programme.sub-title: Paddington And The Love Day Cards
programme.desc: Its Love Day in Windsor Gardens. Mr Brown has forgotten to book a table for Mrs Brown at the cafe and Paddington is on a mission to deliver Love Day cards to all his friends.

programme.title: Ariel
programme.sub-title: The Kite Monster / The Spooky Mirror Trick
programme.desc: The Kite Monster legend. Ursulas spooky mirror traps everyone.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: The Heelers take a long riverside walk but Bingos legs are tired and she wants a piggyback. To distract her, Mum and Dad invent fun games and get her little legs moving again!

programme.title: Knee High Spies
programme.desc: Jeremy and Deena need to sneak into the playroom and shut down Glitchs Noise Maker machine before it wakes cousin Milo from his afternoon nap.

programme.title: Fizzy And Suds
programme.desc: Fizzy and Suds follow a garbage truck, watching bins lifted and rubbish shaken, and see how recycling turns trash into something completely new.

programme.title: Super Monsters: Santas Super Monster Helpers
programme.desc: The Super Monsters save Christmas by helping Santa repair a North Pole mishap, learning the value of teamwork, responsibility, and spreading holiday joy while delivering presents with Grrbus.

programme.title: Andy And The Band
programme.desc: Blus nephew Cub has a monstrous odd job for the band. Can they help him find the Beti?

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Its finally the day of the babys arrival! Mummy and Daddy Pig rush to the hospital, but Peppa and George must stay with Granny and Grandpa Pig instead.

programme.title: Ginger And The Vegesaurs
programme.desc: During a snowball fight, Ginger and the Pea-Rexes accidentally wake up a Kiwimammuthus from its hibernation and have to tire out the furry beast to get it back to sleep.

programme.title: Tish Tash
programme.desc: Bobby and Tish are outside in the garden having a picnic, they each have one cookie left each. Tish gobbles hers up like a cookie eating monster but before Bobby can eat his, an ant steals it away!

programme.title: Builder Brothers Dream Factory
programme.desc: The Dream Factory Crew builds a pigeon coop to house a bunch of wandering pigeons that invaded the Dream Factory.

programme.title: Octonauts
programme.sub-title: The Octonauts And The Midnight Zone
programme.desc: While exploring the deepest part of the ocean, the Midnight Zone, the Octonauts discover a strange rock that happens to be home to a new species of worm.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: Duggee is working on an inventory of the clubhouse supplies to plan for the future. Whats the future like? The Squirrels wonder.

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.sub-title: Magic Mandini and The Great Normanski
programme.desc: Norman practices his magic act for the talent show, but his assistant Mandy is better at magic than he is.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Daddy Pig arrives in a new electric car. The family all go for a ride and are surprised when the car talks and sings!

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.sub-title: The Tale Of The Missing Ducklings
programme.desc: A simple matter of duckling-sitting turns into a potential disaster when the ducklings escape into the wood.

programme.title: Octonauts: Above And Beyond
programme.desc: While on a mission to clean up a forest, Min and the Octonauts discover a hollow, dried-out tree thats inhabited by all kinds of creatures. When the tree becomes threatened, the Octonauts must move it!

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: When Mum and Dad have a disagreement, Bluey makes Dad write a love letter to Mum to make up. Now Bluey must find a way to play Grounds Lava with Bingo and deliver the letter to Mum, without squabbling.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: The squirrels are playing hide and seek but cant find Happy. Duggee can though - he follows Happys footprints. The Squirrels follow lots of footprints that take them to their friends - but theres one set they cant work out.

programme.title: Piripenguins
programme.desc: Facing some tricky problems, the Piris find clever solutions through swapping items.

programme.desc: Dangerous mission: a chaplain with Germanys Special Forces. Plus Austrians are debating how to deal with wolves.

programme.title: Jim Maxwells Ashes Memories
programme.desc: Jim Maxwell bowls an over of memories with his six favourite Ashes Moments. The final one comes from 2005 at Edgbaston, as England claimed an astonishing victory that spawned the iconic Brett Lee/Andrew Flintoff photo.

programme.title: BTN High
programme.desc: We meet the teenagers who have already given up on social media, and support the upcoming ban.

programme.title: Boyer Lecture Series
programme.desc: John Anderson, AC, farmer, grazier and former deputy prime minister, whose talk, Our Civilisational Moment argues that Australia lacks the spirit, not the machinery of democracy.

programme.title: ABC Evening News
programme.desc: Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and todays stories. Plus reporters investigating issues that matter to you. Presented by Greg Jennett.

programme.title: ABC National News
programme.desc: Theres never been a more important time for transparency and trust. ABC News brings you todays top stories and latest news, with more reporters to tell you whats going on and why it matters. Presented by Greg Jennett.

programme.title: ABC News Tonight
programme.desc: When you need to know whats happening turn to ABC News for coverage you can trust. Greg Jennett brings you the days news by reporters in more locations across Australia, connecting communities and telling your stories.

programme.desc: When you need to know whats happening turn to ABC News for coverage you can trust. Meredith Sheehan brings you the days news by reporters in more locations across Australia, connecting communities and telling your stories.

programme.title: BTN High
programme.desc: 17,000 young Australians have told us what they think about the upcoming social media ban. We break down the results.

programme.title: Disconnected: The Teen Social Media Ban
programme.desc: Australia is leading the world with a ban on Under 16s using social media. We ask teens and experts about the move which is being closely watched by big tech giants, platforms and countries grappling with the use of data.

programme.title: The World In 2025
programme.desc: The ABCs network of international correspondents take us back through the stories that helped shape The World in 2025. Presented by Girish Sawlani.

programme.title: Australian Story
programme.desc: Comedian Dave Hughes thought his struggle with addiction was over when he gave up alcohol in his 20s, but his obsession with work and fame has been harder to navigate.

programme.title: DW News
programme.desc: The latest international news and the days top stories from a European perspective. Our broadcast partner DW brings you live coverage from Berlin with updated reports and expert analysis on the big global issues and events.

programme.title: Back Roads
programme.desc: Heather Ewart heads to the South Australian outback to check out two mining towns that are chalk and cheese - Roxby Downs and its unruly cousin, Andamooka.

programme.title: ABC News
programme.desc: Melissa Mackay presents todays top stories and latest news as Australia observes a Day of Reflection to honour the victims of the horrific terrorist attack at Bondi Beach and to stand in solidarity with the Jewish community.
